fields.name: 12 Tone Equal Temperament
fields.description: Divides an octave into twelve semitones of equal size.

fields.name: 5-Limit Just Temperament
fields.description: A Just Temperament which limits the calculation of intervals to combining intervals of 2:1, 3:2, 5:4, i.e. 'just' or harmonic octaves, fifths and major thirds, respectively.

fields.name: Pythagorean Tuning
fields.description: Pythagorean tuning caculates intervals by prioritising the interval of the fifth, or 3:2.
